item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Various Legacy Titles & Expended Editions from Qobuz
item.description:
I'm looking for help with any of these releases on Qobuz.

I pulled links from the US site to ensure the releases actually exist since most of them are listed as "Download Unavailable" on the Qobuz website in my country. Is there a reason for that? Licensing or something?

THANK YOU in advance.


Billie Ray Martin

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/your-loving-arms-remixes-billie-ray-martin/kvq8e90kf9fhb

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/y...bonus-remixes-billie-ray-martin/npc1bngqrcv0b


Aretha Franklin

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/whos-zoomin-who-expanded-edition-aretha-franklin/0886444346740

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/aretha-expanded-edition-aretha-franklin/wd2buismjz8la

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/through-the-storm-expanded-edition-aretha-franklin/0886445617580

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/d...e-a-deeper-love-aretha-franklin/0828768645956


Miscellaneous

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/wishing-on-a-star-the-cover-girls/fg2zttk538fec

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/true-colors-cyndi-lauper/nvwfwfv3wiwbb
item.author: Skribble
